************
Installation
************

To install PyMeta, first you need to clone the project from GitHub.

.. code-block:: html
   :linenos:

    git clone https://github.com/romulomadu/pymeta.git

Go to project folder:

.. code-block:: bash
   :linenos:

    cd pymeta

Install with `pipenv`:

.. code-block:: bash
   :linenos:

    pipenv shell
    pipenv install -e .
